name: Payment Request API
description: Payment Request is a new API for the open web that makes checkout flows easier, faster and consistent on shopping sites.

links.title: Bringing easy and fast checkout with Payment Request API
MDN Web Docs - Payment Request API

notes.general: Apple provides an equivalent proprietary API called [Apple Pay JS](https://developer.apple.com/reference/applepayjs/). Google provides a [PaymentRequest wrapper for Apple Pay JS](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/appr-wrapper).

byNum.1: Can be enabled via the "Experimental Web Platform features" flag
byNum.2: Can be enabled via the "Experimental Web Payments API" flag
byNum.4: Can be enabled via the "[Web Payments API](chrome://flags/#web-payments)" flag
byNum.5: Unlike Desktop Chrome, support has been in Chrome for Android since version 53.
byNum.6: Can be enabled via the `dom.payments.request.enabled` flag in "about:config" flag since 55.
byNum.8: Disabled by default in Nightly. To enable, go to "about:config" and set "dom.payments.request.enabled" to true, and "dom.payments.request.supportedRegions" to "US,CA".
